TopicTitle: Science/Parts Unlock Suggestion (a new mode perhaps?)

Articles.Content:
Unsure if this has been suggested or not, but bather than just have parts be unlocked by science points alone, how about integrate the unlocking of parts with a task, or visiting another body. Like say, orbiting the Mun unlocks the docking ports, or landing on Duna unlocks the radial chutes. It could be done in such a way that you either know you have to go to Duna to get the radial chutes or it could be a surprise. Or, integrate it with the Easter Eggs, or Munar/Minmus/other body biomes.

"Looking at the [Easter Egg here], you were suddenly struck with inspiration for a new part." When arriving back at KSC, you go to the R & D facility to find out what it is.

Thoughts?

I didn't think this fell under the what not to suggest, because I wasn't asking for new parts or a re-arranging of the tech tree.
